mapper.select: SELECT substr(scontent,1,10)as scontent,sns_tbl.* FROM sns_tbl where mpk = #{mpk } order by spk desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_tbl (spk, stitle, scontent, sdate, mpk, stag, ssort) VALUES (sns_seq.nextval, #{stitle}, #{scontent}, sysdate, #{mpk}, #{stag}, #{ssort})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mpk,m.mname,p.ppk,nvl(p.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile, nvl(p.ppath,'WEB-INF/views/upload/profile') as ppath FROM ASTMember m, ASTProfile p WHERE m.mpk=p.mpk(+) and m.mpk=#{mpk } order by ppk desc
SELECT m.mpk,m.mid,m.mname,p.ppk,nvl(p.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile, nvl(p.ppath,'WEB-INF/views/upload/profile') as ppath FROM ASTMember m, ASTProfile p WHERE m.mpk=p.mpk(+) and m.mname LIKE #{mname}
SELECT * FROM sns_tbl where mpk = #{mpk} and ssort = 'review'

select rt.*,nvl(af.pfile,'mu.jpg') as pfile ,nvl(af.ppath,'mu.jpg') as ppath,am.mname,am.mid from ASTMember am,ASTProfile af,reply_tbl rt where am.mpk=af.mpk(+) and am.mpk=rt.mpk and spk=#{spk} order by rpk asc
mapper.update: UPDATE sns_tbl SET shits=shits+1 WHERE spk=#{spk}
